findings.title: RMF - Redundant MasterChef Functionality
findings.description: The contract declares certain functions and modifiers that are not used in a meaningful way by the contract.

findings.title: RSK - Redundant Storage Keyword
findings.description: The contract uses the `storage` keyword in a view function.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract contains dead code that is not executed or reached during normal contract execution.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: The contract contains local scope variable shadowing which can lead to confusion and unintended consequences.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: The contract uses assembly which can be error-prone and difficult to read and understand.
